name: npm-max-dir-index
description: This is a package that accepts two arguments - directory and regular expression. In the regular expression must have a backreference, which is a number. The package performs iteration of all files in a directory and returns a number that is one greater than the maximum.
author: Georgi Naumov <gonaumov@gmail.com> (http://georgi-naumov.blogspot.bg/)
